meanings.definition: Not joined or connected in a series or chain.
meanings.sent1: The nonconjugated beads were scattered all over the floor.
meanings.sent2: The necklace was made of nonconjugated colorful beads.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the nonconjugated beads, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like nonconjugated beads, each one independent and unique.
meanings.sent5: The nonconjugated beads sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Not involving the sharing of electrons between adjacent atoms.
meanings.sent1: The nonconjugated atoms remained stable in the molecule.
meanings.sent2: The nonconjugated atoms formed a distinct pattern in the compound.
meanings.sent3: The nonconjugated atoms threw a party, refusing to share electrons.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like nonconjugated atoms, independent yet harmonious.
meanings.sent5: The nonconjugated atoms stood out, each one holding its own charge.

meanings.sent1: The nonconjugated equations puzzled the students.
meanings.sent2: The nonconjugated numbers stood alone in the sequence.
meanings.sent3: The nonconjugated pair of socks seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like nonconjugated numbers, never quite fitting together.
meanings.sent5: The nonconjugated pair of gloves kept getting lost, each one on its own adventure.
